Comments: Has a decent forehand, needs to keep racket low on swing back.  Footwork issues
Needed to learn Continental Grip and Two Hand backhand.  Grip reverting, causing open face and slicing
Great Serves, uses wrong grip but good timing.  Fix toss
Remembered most of the past lesson.  Worked half an hour on footwork, issues falling on back foot
Fixed grip changing, toss practice.  Started learning slice serve
Review grip and shots.  Work on footwork and two-hand
